definition[0]: to talk about something in a way that makes it seem much worse than it really is
example[0]: I know I’m piling it on a bit, but there is a serious point to be made.
definition[1]: to show that you are much better than your opponent in a game
example[1]: England piled on the pressure from the start.
definition[2]: to gain a lot of body weight
example[2]: She slimmed down a couple of years ago but has piled on the pounds again.
